text: You should now see a clear and direct option to cancel your current plan.
Once you initiate the cancellation , you will receive both an email and an SMS confirmation within the next five minutes to confirm that your request has been successfully processed .
For our internal analysis and to help us improve our services, we will also record the reason for your cancellation.
We value your feedback and may reach out separately to gather more details about your experience .
